database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Bead-based profiling of tyrosine kinase phosphorylation identifies SRC as a glioblastoma target
entry.description: Du J, Bernasconi P, Clauser KR, Mani DR, Finn SP, Beroukhim R, Burns M, Julian B, Peng XP, Hieronymus H, Maglathlin RL, Lewis TA, Liau LM, Nghiemphu P, Mellinghoff IK, Louis DN, Loda M, Carr SA,Kung AL, Golub TR. Nat Biotech, 2009, 27, 77-83. PMCID:PMC3057643.
